extension.dc:title: Darwin Core Occurrence
extension.name: Occurrence
extension.dc:subject: dwc:Event dwc:Taxon
extension.dc:description: Support for Darwin Core Occurrence-based records.

property.name: type
property.comments: Must be populated with a value from the DCMI type vocabulary (http://dublincore.org/documents/2010/10/11/dcmi-type-vocabulary/).
property.dc:description: The nature or genre of the resource.

property.name: modified
property.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a date that conforms to ISO 8601-1:2019.
property.examples: `1963-03-08T14:07-0600` (8 Mar 1963 at 2:07pm in the time zone six hours earlier than UTC); `2009-02-20T08:40Z` (20 February 2009 8:40am UTC); `2018-08-29T15:19` (3:19pm local time on 29 August 2018); `1809-02-12` (some time during 12 February 1809); `1906-06` (some time in June 1906); `1971` (some time in the year 1971); `2007-03-01T13:00:00Z/2008-05-11T15:30:00Z` (some time during the interval between 1 March 2007 1pm UTC and 11 May 2008 3:30pm UTC); `1900/1909` (some time during the interval between the beginning of the year 1900 and the end of the year 1909); `2007-11-13/15` (some time in the interval between 13 November 2007 and 15 November 2007)
property.dc:description: The most recent date-time on which the resource was changed.

property.name: language
property.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as RFC 5646.
property.dc:description: A language of the resource.

property.name: license
property.dc:description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.

property.name: rightsHolder
property.examples: `The Regents of the University of California`
property.dc:description: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource.

property.name: accessRights
property.comments: Access Rights may include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies.
property.dc:description: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status.

property.name: bibliographicCitation
property.comments: From Dublin Core, "Recommended practice is to include sufficient bibliographic detail to identify the resource as unambiguously as possible." The intended usage of this term in Darwin Core is to provide the preferred way to cite the resource itself - "how to cite this record". Note that the intended usage of dcterms:references in Darwin Core, by contrast, is to point to the definitive source representation of the resource - "where to find the as-close-to-original reference, if one is available.
property.examples: `Museum of Vertebrate Zoology, UC Berkeley. MVZ Mammal Collection (Arctos). Record ID: http://arctos.database.museum/guid/MVZ:Mamm:165861?seid=101356. Source: http://ipt.vertnet.org:8080/ipt/resource.do?r=mvz_mammal.` (Occurrence example); `https://www.gbif.org/species/2439608 Source: GBIF Taxonomic Backbone` (Taxon example); `Rand, K.M., Logerwell, E.A. The first demersal trawl survey of benthic fish and invertebrates in the Beaufort Sea since the late 1970s. Polar Biol 34, 475–488 (2011). https://doi.org/10.1007/s00300-010-0900-2` (Event example)
property.dc:description: A bibliographic reference for the resource.

property.name: references
property.comments: From Dublin Core, "This property is intended to be used with non-literal values. This property is an inverse property of Is Referenced By." The intended usage of this term in Darwin Core is to point to the definitive source representation of the resource (e.g.,Taxon, Occurrence, Event in Darwin Core), if one is available. Note that the intended usage of dcterms:bibliographicCitation in Darwin Core, by contrast, is to provide the preferred way to cite the resource itself.
property.dc:description: A related resource that is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by the described resource.

property.name: institutionID
property.comments: For physical specimens, the recommended best practice is to use a globally unique and resolvable identifier from a collections registry such as the Research Organization Registry (ROR) or the Global Registry of Scientific Collections (https://www.gbif.org/grscicoll).
property.dc:description: An identifier for the institution having custody of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

translation.label: Institution ID
translation.comments: An identifier for the institution having custody of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.
translation.dc:description: For physical specimens, the recommended best practice is to use a globally unique and resolvable identifier from a collections registry such as the Research Organization Registry (ROR) or the Global Registry of Scientific Collections (https://scientific-collections.gbif.org/)

translation.label: ID Instituce
translation.comments: Identifikátor instituce, která má v péči předmět(y) nebo informace uvedené v záznamu.
translation.dc:description: U fyzických vzorků se jako osvědčená praxe doporučuje používat globálně jedinečný a rozlišitelný identifikátor z registru sbírek, jako je například Research Organization Registry (ROR) nebo Global Registry of Scientific Collections (https://scientific-collections.gbif.org/)

Para los especímenes físicos, la mejor práctica recomendada es utilizar un identificador único y resoluble globalmente de un registro de colecciones, como el Registro de Organizaciones de Investigación (ROR) o el Registro Global de Colecciones Científicas (https://scientific-collections.gbif.org/)

translation.label: Identifiant de l'institution
translation.comments: Un identifiant de l'institution qui a la garde de l'objet (ou des objets) ou de l'information mentionnée dans l'enregistrement.
translation.dc:description: Pour les spécimens physiques, la pratique optimale recommandée est d'utiliser un identifiant unique et résoluble à l'échelle mondiale provenant d'un registre de collections tel que le Research Organization Registry (ROR) ou le Global Registry of Scientific Collections (https://scientific-collections.gbif.org/)

property.name: collectionID
property.comments: For physical specimens, the recommended best practice is to use a globally unique and resolvable identifier from a collections registry such as the Global Registry of Scientific Collections (https://www.gbif.org/grscicoll).
property.dc:description: An identifier for the collection or dataset from which the record was derived.

translation.label: Collection ID
translation.comments: An identifier for the collection or dataset from which the record was derived.
translation.dc:description: For physical specimens, the recommended best practice is to use a globally unique and resolvable identifier from a collections registry such as the Global Registry of Scientific Collections (https://scientific-collections.gbif.org/).

translation.label: ID sbírky
translation.comments: Identifikátor sbírky nebo datové sady, ze které byl záznam odvozen.
translation.dc:description: U fyzických exemplářů je doporučeným osvědčeným postupem použití celosvětově jedinečného a rozlišitelného identifikátoru z registru sbírek, jako je Globální registr vědeckých sbírek (https://scientific-collections.gbif.org/).

Para los especímenes físicos, la mejor práctica recomendada es utilizar un identificador único y resoluble a nivel global de un registro de colecciones, como el Registro Global de Colecciones Científicas (https://scientific-collections.gbif.org/).

translation.label: Identifiant de la collection
translation.comments: Un identifiant de la collection ou la série de données à partir desquelles l'enregistrement a été obtenu.
translation.dc:description: Pour les spécimens physiques, la pratique optimale recommandée est d'utiliser un identifiant unique et résoluble à l'échelle mondiale provenant d'un registre de collections tel que le Global Registry of Scientific Collections (https://scientific-collections.gbif.org).

property.name: datasetID
property.dc:description: An identifier for the set of data. May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to a collection or institution.

translation.label: Dataset ID
translation.comments: An identifier for the set of data. May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to a collection or institution.

translation.label: ID datové sady
translation.comments: Identifikátor datové sady. Může to být globální jedinečný identifikátor nebo identifikátor specifický pro sbírku nebo instituci.

translation.label: Identifiant du jeu de données
translation.comments: Un identifiant pour le jeu de données. Il peut s'agir d'un identifiant unique global (GUI) ou d'un identifiant spécifique à une collection ou à une institution.

property.name: institutionCode
property.dc:description: The name (or acronym) in use by the institution having custody of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

translation.label: Institution Code
translation.comments: The name (or acronym) in use by the institution having custody of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

translation.label: Kód instituce
translation.comments: Název (nebo zkratka) používaný institucí, která má v péči předmět(y) nebo informace uvedené v záznamu.

translation.label: Code de l'institution
translation.comments: Le nom (ou l'acronyme) en vigueur pour l'institution qui a la garde de l'objet (ou des objets) ou de l'information mentionnée dans l'enregistrement.

translation.label: 機構代碼
translation.comments: 發布機構所使用的名稱（博物館）代碼或縮寫。

property.name: collectionCode
property.dc:description: The name, acronym, coden, or initialism identifying the collection or data set from which the record was derived.

translation.label: Collection Code
translation.comments: The name, acronym, coden, or initialism identifying the collection or data set from which the record was derived.

translation.label: Kód sbírky
translation.comments: Název, zkratka, kód nebo iniciála identifikující sbírku nebo soubor dat, z nichž byl záznam odvozen.

translation.label: Code de la collection
translation.comments: Le nom, l'acronyme, le coden ou le sigle identifiant la collection ou la série de données à partir desquelles l'enregistrement a été obtenu.

translation.label: 典藏代碼
translation.comments: 該筆紀錄來源的代稱、代碼或縮寫，如典藏機構的標本分類代碼。

property.name: datasetName
property.dc:description: The name identifying the data set from which the record was derived.

translation.label: Dataset Name
translation.comments: The name identifying the data set from which the record was derived.

translation.label: Název datové sady
translation.comments: Název identifikující datovou sadu, ze které byl záznam odvozen.

translation.label: Nom du jeu de données
translation.comments: Le nom identifiant le jeu de données à partir duquel l'enregistrement a été obtenu.

property.name: ownerInstitutionCode
property.dc:description: The name (or acronym) in use by the institution having ownership of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

translation.label: Owner Institution Code
translation.comments: The name (or acronym) in use by the institution having ownership of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

translation.label: Kód instituce vlastníka
translation.comments: Název (nebo zkratka) používaný institucí, která vlastní předmět(y) nebo informace uvedené v záznamu.

translation.label: Code de l'institution propriétaire
translation.comments: Le nom (ou l'acronyme) utilisé par l'institution propriétaire de ou des objets ou de ou des informations mentionnés dans l'enregistrement.

property.name: basisOfRecord
property.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the set of local names of the identifiers for classes in Darwin Core.
property.dc:description: The specific nature of the data record.

translation.label: Basis Of Record
translation.comments: The specific nature of the data record.
translation.dc:description: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the set of local names of the identifiers for classes in Darwin Core.

translation.label: Základ záznamu
translation.comments: Specifická povaha datového záznamu.
translation.dc:description: Doporučeným osvědčeným postupem je používat řízený slovník, například sadu místních názvů identifikátorů tříd v Darwin Core.

translation.label: Catégorie d'enregistrement
translation.comments: La nature précise de l'enregistrement.
translation.dc:description: La pratique optimale recommandée est d'utiliser un vocabulaire contrôlé tel que l'ensemble des noms locaux des identifiants de classes du Darwin Core.

translation.label: 紀錄類型
translation.comments: 資料紀錄的特定性質、類型。
translation.dc:description: 建議使用 Darwin Core 的控制詞彙。

property.name: informationWithheld
property.comments: This term has an equivalent in the dwciri: namespace that allows only an IRI as a value, whereas this term allows for any string literal value.
property.examples: `location information not given for endangered species`; `collector identities withheld | ask about tissue samples`
property.dc:description: Additional information that exists, but that has not been shared in the given record.

translation.label: Information Withheld
translation.comments: Additional information that exists, but that has not been shared in the given record.
translation.dc:description: This term has an equivalent in the dwciri: namespace that allows only an IRI as a value, whereas this term allows for any string literal value.

translation.label: Zatajené informace
translation.comments: Další informace, které existují, ale nebyly sdíleny v daném záznamu.
translation.dc:description: Tento termín má ekvivalent ve jmenném prostoru dwciri:, který jako hodnotu umožňuje pouze IRI, zatímco tento termín umožňuje zadat jakoukoli řetězcovou literální hodnotu.

translation.label: Information non renseignée
translation.comments: Informations supplémentaires qui existent, mais qui n'ont pas été partagées dans l'enregistrement correspondant.
translation.dc:description: Ce terme a un équivalent dans le dwciri: namespace qui n'autorise qu'un IRI comme valeur, alors que ce terme autorise n'importe quelle valeur sous forme de chaîne de caractères.

property.name: dataGeneralizations
property.comments: This term has an equivalent in the dwciri: namespace that allows only an IRI as a value, whereas this term allows for any string literal value.
property.examples: `Coordinates generalized from original GPS coordinates to the nearest half degree grid cell`.
property.dc:description: Actions taken to make the shared data less specific or complete than in its original form. Suggests that alternative data of higher quality may be available on request.

translation.label: Data Generalizations
translation.comments: Actions taken to make the shared data less specific or complete than in its original form. Suggests that alternative data of higher quality may be available on request.
translation.dc:description: This term has an equivalent in the dwciri: namespace that allows only an IRI as a value, whereas this term allows for any string literal value.

translation.label: Zobecnění dat
translation.comments: Opatření přijatá za účelem snížení specifičnosti nebo úplnosti sdílených údajů oproti jejich původní podobě. Navrhuje, že na vyžádání mohou být k dispozici alternativní údaje vyšší kvality.
translation.dc:description: Tento termín má ekvivalent ve jmenném prostoru dwciri:, který jako hodnotu umožňuje pouze IRI, zatímco tento termín umožňuje zadat jakoukoli řetězcovou literální hodnotu.

translation.label: Généralisation des données
translation.comments: Mesures prises pour rendre les données partagées moins précises ou moins complètes que dans leur forme originale. Cela peut signifier que des données de meilleure qualité peuvent être disponibles sur demande.
translation.dc:description: Ce terme a un équivalent dans le dwciri: namespace qui n'autorise qu'un IRI comme valeur, alors que ce terme autorise n'importe quelle valeur sous forme de chaîne de caractères.

property.name: dynamicProperties
property.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a key:value encoding schema for a data interchange format such as JSON.
property.dc:description: A list of additional measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions about the record. Meant to provide a mechanism for structured content.

translation.label: Dynamic Properties
translation.comments: A list of additional measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions about the record. Meant to provide a mechanism for structured content.
translation.dc:description: Recommended best practice is to use a key:value encoding schema for a data interchange format such as JSON.

translation.label: Dynamické vlastnosti
translation.comments: Seznam dalších měření, skutečností, charakteristik nebo tvrzení o záznamu. Slouží jako mechanismus pro strukturovaný obsah.
translation.dc:description: Doporučeným osvědčeným postupem je použití schématu kódování klíč:hodnota pro formát výměny dat, jako je JSON.

translation.label: Propriétés dynamiques
translation.comments: Une liste de mesures, de faits, de caractéristiques ou d'affirmations supplémentaires concernant le document. Il s'agit d'un mécanisme permettant de structurer le contenu.
translation.dc:description: La pratique optimale recommandée est d'utiliser un encodage clé:valeur pour un format d'échange de données tel que JSON.

property.name: occurrenceID
property.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a persistent, globally unique identifier.
property.dc:description: An identifier for the dwc:Occurrence (as opposed to a particular digital record of the dwc:Occurrence). In the absence of a persistent global unique identifier, construct one from a combination of identifiers in the record that will most closely make the dwc:occurrenceID globally unique.

translation.label: Occurrence ID
translation.comments: An identifier for the dwc:Occurrence (as opposed to a particular digital record of the dwc:Occurrence). In the absence of a persistent global unique identifier, construct one from a combination of identifiers in the record that will most closely make the dwc:occurrenceID globally unique.
translation.dc:description: Recommended best practice is to use a persistent, globally unique identifier.

translation.label: ID Výskytu
translation.comments: Identifikátor dwc:Occurrence (na rozdíl od konkrétního digitálního záznamu dwc:Occurrence). Pokud neexistuje trvalý globální jedinečný identifikátor, vytvořte jej z kombinace identifikátorů v záznamu, která bude nejpřesněji zajišťovat globální jedinečnost dwc:occurrenceID.
translation.dc:description: Doporučeným osvědčeným postupem je použití trvalého, globálně jedinečného identifikátoru.

translation.label: Identifiant de l'occurrence
translation.comments: Un identifiant pour la dwc:Occurrence (par opposition à un enregistrement numérique particulier de la dwc:Occurrence). En l'absence d'un identifiant unique global permanent, en construire un à partir d'une combinaison d'identifiants dans l'enregistrement qui rendra la dwc:Occurrence la plus unique possible à l'échelle globale.
translation.dc:description: La pratique optimale recommandée est d'utiliser un identifiant permanent et unique au niveau mondial (GUI).

property.name: catalogNumber
property.dc:description: An identifier (preferably unique) for the record within the data set or collection.

translation.label: Catalog Number
translation.comments: An identifier (preferably unique) for the record within the data set or collection.

translation.label: Katalogové číslo
translation.comments: Identifikátor (nejlépe jedinečný) záznamu v rámci souboru dat nebo sbírky.

translation.label: Numéro de catalogue
translation.comments: Un identifiant (de préférence unique) pour l'enregistrement dans la série de données ou dans la collection.

property.name: recordNumber
property.comments: This term has an equivalent in the dwciri: namespace that allows only an IRI as a value, whereas this term allows for any string literal value.
property.dc:description: An identifier given to the dwc:Occurrence at the time it was recorded. Often serves as a link between field notes and a dwc:Occurrence record, such as a specimen collector's number.

translation.label: Record Number
translation.comments: An identifier given to the dwc:Occurrence at the time it was recorded. Often serves as a link between field notes and a dwc:Occurrence record, such as a specimen collector's number.
translation.dc:description: This term has an equivalent in the dwciri: namespace that allows only an IRI as a value, whereas this term allows for any string literal value.

translation.label: Číslo záznamu
translation.comments: Identifikátor přidělený dwc:Occurrence v době, kdy byl zaznamenán. Často slouží jako spojovací článek mezi terénními poznámkami a záznamem dwc:Occurrence, např. číslo sběratele exempláře.
translation.dc:description: Tento termín má ekvivalent ve jmenném prostoru dwciri:, který jako hodnotu umožňuje pouze IRI, zatímco tento termín umožňuje zadat jakoukoli řetězcovou literální hodnotu.

translation.label: Numéro d'enregistrement
translation.comments: Un identifiant donné à la dwc:Occurrence au moment où elle a été enregistrée. Il sert souvent de lien entre les notes de terrain et l'enregistrement d'une dwc:Occurrence, comme le numéro de terrain d'un spécimen.
translation.dc:description: Ce terme a un équivalent dans le dwciri: namespace qui n'autorise qu'un IRI comme valeur, alors que ce terme autorise n'importe quelle valeur sous forme de chaîne de caractères.

property.name: recordedBy
property.comments: Recommended best practice is to separate the values in a list with space vertical bar space (` | `). This term has an equivalent in the dwciri: namespace that allows only an IRI as a value, whereas this term allows for any string literal value.
property.examples: `José E. Crespo`; `Oliver P. Pearson | Anita K. Pearson` (where the value in recordNumber `OPP 7101` corresponds to the collector number for the specimen in the field catalog of Oliver P. Pearson)
property.dc:description: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of people, groups, or organizations responsible for recording the original dwc:Occurrence. The primary collector or observer, especially one who applies a personal identifier (dwc:recordNumber), should be listed first.

translation.label: Recorded By
translation.comments: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of people, groups, or organizations responsible for recording the original dwc:Occurrence. The primary collector or observer, especially one who applies a personal identifier (dwc:recordNumber), should be listed first.
translation.dc:description: Recommended best practice is to separate the values in a list with space vertical bar space (` | `). This term has an equivalent in the dwciri: namespace that allows only an IRI as a value, whereas this term allows for any string literal value.
translation.examples: `José E. Crespo`; `Oliver P. Pearson | Anita K. Pearson` (where the value in recordNumber `OPP 7101` corresponds to the collector number for the specimen in the field catalog of Oliver P. Pearson)

translation.label: Zaznamenáno od
translation.comments: Seznam (spojený a oddělený) jmen osob, skupin nebo organizací odpovědných za zaznamenání původního dwc:Occurrence. Primární sběratel nebo pozorovatel, zejména ten, který používá osobní identifikátor (dwc:recordNumber), by měl být uveden jako první.
translation.dc:description: Doporučeným postupem je oddělovat hodnoty v seznamu mezerou svislou čarou mezerou (` | `). Tento termín má ekvivalent ve jmenném prostoru dwciri:, který jako hodnotu povoluje pouze IRI, zatímco tento termín povoluje jakoukoli řetězcovou literální hodnotu.
translation.examples: `José E. Crespo`; `Oliver P. Pearson | Anita K. Pearson` (kde hodnota v recordNumber `OPP 7101` odpovídá sběratelskému číslu exempláře v terénním katalogu Olivera P. Pearsona)

translation.label: Enregistré par
translation.comments: Une liste (concaténée et séparée) des noms des personnes, groupes ou organisations responsables de l'enregistrement de la dwc:Occurrence originale. Le collecteur ou l'observateur principal, en particulier celui qui utilise un système d'identifiants personnels (dwc:recordNumber), doit être listé en premier.
translation.dc:description: La pratique optimale recommandée est de séparer les valeurs d'une liste par une barre verticale (` | `). Ce terme a un équivalent dans le dwciri: namespace qui n'autorise qu'un IRI comme valeur, alors que ce terme autorise n'importe quelle valeur sous forme de chaîne de caractères.
translation.examples: `José E. Crespo` ; `Oliver P. Pearson | Anita K. Pearson` (la valeur `OPP 7101` dans recordNumber correspond au numéro de collecte pour le spécimen dans le catalogue de terrain d'Oliver P. Pearson)

property.name: recordedByID
property.comments: Recommended best practice is to provide a single identifier that disambiguates the details of the identifying agent. If a list is used, it is recommended to separate the values in the list with space vertical bar space (` | `). The order of the identifiers on any list for this term can not be guaranteed to convey any semantics.
property.examples: `https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0097` (for an individual); `https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0097 | https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0098` (for a list of people)
property.dc:description: A list (concatenated and separated) of the globally unique identifier for the person, people, groups, or organizations responsible for recording the original dwc:Occurrence.

translation.label: Recorded By ID
translation.comments: A list (concatenated and separated) of the globally unique identifier for the person, people, groups, or organizations responsible for recording the original dwc:Occurrence.
translation.dc:description: Recommended best practice is to provide a single identifier that disambiguates the details of the identifying agent. If a list is used, it is recommended to separate the values in the list with space vertical bar space (` | `). The order of the identifiers on any list for this term can not be guaranteed to convey any semantics.
translation.examples: `https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0097` (for an individual); `https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0097 | https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0098` (for a list of people)

translation.label: Zaznamenáno od ID
translation.comments: Seznam (spojený a oddělený) globálně jedinečného identifikátoru osoby, osob, skupin nebo organizací odpovědných za zaznamenání původní dwc:Occurrence.
translation.dc:description: Doporučeným osvědčeným postupem je uvedení jediného identifikátoru, který jednoznačně určuje údaje o identifikačním prostředku. Pokud se používá seznam, doporučuje se oddělit hodnoty v seznamu mezerou svislou čárou mezerou (` | `). Pořadí identifikátorů v jakémkoli seznamu pro tento termín nemůže zaručit, že vyjadřuje jakoukoli sémantiku.
translation.examples: `https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0097` (pro jednotlivce); `https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0097 | https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0098` (pro seznam osob)

translation.label: Identifiant de l'enregistreur
translation.comments: Une liste (concaténée et séparée) de l'identifiant unique global (GUI) de la personne, des personnes, des groupes ou des organisations responsables de l’acquisition de la dwc:Occurrence.
translation.dc:description: La pratique optimale recommandée est de fournir un identifiant unique qui distingue les informations sur l'agent identificateur. Si une liste est utilisée, il est recommandé de séparer les valeurs par une barre verticale (` | `). L'ordre des identificateurs dans toute liste pour ce terme ne peut être considéré comme porteur d'une quelconque signification.
translation.examples: `https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0097` (pour un individu) ; `https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0097 | https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0098` (pour une liste de personnes)
